=================================
Model Compression Techniques
=================================


+------------+-------------------+--------------+-------------+---------+-----------+--------------+
| Method     | Weight Update    | Calibration | Data        | Pruning | Metric    | Sij Complexity|
+============+===================+==============+=============+=========+===========+==============+
| Magnitude  |       ✗           |      ✗       |    |Wij|    |   O(1)  |              |
+------------+-------------------+--------------+-------------+---------+-----------+--------------+
| SparseGPT  |       ✓           |      ✓       |    |W|²/diag |         | (XXᵀ + λI)⁻¹ |   O(d³hidden) |
|            |                   |              |             |         |           |              |
|            |                   |              |             |         |           |              |
+------------+-------------------+--------------+-------------+---------+-----------+--------------+
| Wanda      |       ✗           |      ✓       |    |Wij| · ||Xj||² |   O(d²hidden)|              |
+------------+-------------------+--------------+-------------+---------+-----------+--------------+
